title: Rain Shadow
description: Luke "Reno" Barringer knows two things for sure - he doesn't fit in Dreygon Sharpe's MC world and he's not leaving it without Angel.Angel Sharpe feels her whole life slipping away along with the man she loves and there seems to be no way back to happiness.Rain Shadow Book 3 of 5The Barringer Brothers SeriesApproximately 40,000 words.
author: Tess Oliver
